page.title: 12Langtoft Post Office
page.content: My name is Lynda Richardson.I live at Langtoft Post Office.My mum is the postmisttress.On Thursday Mrs Brent comes to help mum because she is very busy with pensions.The post office is a shop aswell.The shop and post office are separated from each other by a bandit screen.We live in the house that is joined on to the shop.We sell food,stationery things like pencils rulers and pens,cards for different ocasions and other things in the shop. In the post office we sell stamps and we do pensions and other things.On Monday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday we open at 9am then close at noon for lunch opening again at 1pm till 5.30pm Tuesday is half day closing.We open at 9am and close at 1pm.On Saturday we open at 9am till noon.The shop is only opened in the afternoon.It opens 1pm till 4pm.On Sunday we are closed.
